plugins.name: say-your-harmony
plugins.description: 4-Phase Development Orchestration System: Planning, Design, Implementation, Operation. Features 9 specialized agents (harmony, planner, architect, builder, operator, explorer, documenter, meta-analyzer, meta-aggregator), meta-analysis feedback loop, session retention, and 4.25x efficiency via parallel execution.
